resources.string: This Application helps you find out if there are fake cameras on your phone or not. The number you see below is the number of camera(s) this app could detect. For example if there are 4 cameras (including the front camera) on your phone but you see here 3, then it means that there is 1(one) fake camera. Since on many device there are many fake cameras just for the style. I have tested this app on multiple device so dont worry its works fluid.....
Number of Camera(s) on this device
